mapper.insert: insert into insure_function_log(id, hosp_code, visit_id,medis_code, msg_id, msg_info, msg_name, in_params, out_params, code, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, error_msg, is_hospital, status) values (#{id},#{hospCode},#{visitId},#{medisCode},#{msgId},#{msgInfo},#{msgName},#{inParams}, #{outParams},#{code},#{crteId},#{crteName},#{crteTime},#{errorMsg},#{isHospital}, #{status})
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, visit_id, msg_id, msg_info, msg_name, in_params, out_params, code, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, error_msg, is_hospital, status, medis_code from insure_function_log where id =#{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} order by crte_time desc limit 1
